OWNER.description: Pleas enter Number Of the Owner.

S_PACK.description: Sticker Pack Name (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

WORKTYPE.description: change the Work Type (public or private)

S_AUTHOR.description: Sticker author name. (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

NORMAL.description: Use Fancy Templayes Rather Than Normal Messages

ALIVE_MESS.description: Set Alive Message. (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

OWNER_MESS.description: Set Owner message. (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

LISTICON.description: small logo or icon to appear in menu (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

WATERMARK.description: watermark for the bot (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

BOTNAME.description: Name of The BOT (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

ICON.description: Icon to appear in menu (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

MAIL.description: Premium user number (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

YOUTUBE.description: Youtube Channel Link (leave it if you dont have one)

GITHUB.description: Your Github Account URL (leave it if you dont have one)

INSTAGRAM.description: Your Instagram Id URL (leave it if you dont have one)

NAME.description: Owner Name (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

FOOTER.description: Footer Text For The Bot (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

IMAGE.description: Main Image For The Bot (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

IMAGE2.description: Image For The Bot (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

BUTTONURL_LINK1.description: URL Button Id/Link (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

BUTTONURL_LINK2.description: Second URL Button Id/Link (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

BUTTONURL_OPTION1.description: URL Button Name (leave it if you Wish to use the default:Instagram)

BUTTONURL_OPTION2.description: Second URL Button Name (leave it if you Wish to use the default:YouTube)

LIST_HEAD.description: Hedding Message For List Menu (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

MENU_MESSAGE.description: Main footer Message To Be Shown In Main Menu (shows when use command .menu) (leave it if you Wish to use the default)

APP_NAME.description: Heroku App name to manage the worker (you canot use restart if u dont fill thsi and HEROKU_API)

HEROKU_API.description: Heroku API key for managing the worker (You canot use restart if u dont fill thsi and APP_NAME)

SESSION_ID.description: Add your Session ID here you got from Your Bot

ZENS_API.description: Get an API key From https://zenzapi.xyz To Use The API Functions.
